hero.title: Excellence in Precision
hero.description: With gear hobbing, CNC machining, and advanced manufacturing methods, we offer high-precision gear solutions for automotive, defense, and industrial applications.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.heading: Comprehensive Manufacturing Solutions
services.description: With our modern machinery and expert team, we provide professional services at every stage of gear production

gearHobbing.title: Gear Hobbing
gearHobbing.description: With our high-precision gear hobbing machines, we achieve excellent results in the production of spur and helical gears. We have production capacity in a wide range from module 0.5 to 12.

cncMachining.title: CNC Machining
cncMachining.description: With our state-of-the-art CNC lathe and milling machines, we perform precise machining of gears and mechanical parts with complex geometries. We have 5-axis machining capability.

gearGrinding.title: Gear Grinding
gearGrinding.description: With our precision gear grinding machines, we provide surface quality and dimensional accuracy in DIN 5-6 quality class. We achieve excellent results even on hardened materials.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: With our CMM measuring devices, gear testing machines, and surface roughness measurement systems, we guarantee that every part produced meets quality standards.

heatTreatment.title: Heat Treatment
heatTreatment.description: In our in-house heat treatment units, we optimize the mechanical properties of your gears through carburizing, quenching, and tempering processes.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: We offer custom design and manufacturing services tailored to customer needs. We are with you in all processes from prototype to mass production.

technologies.title: OUR TECHNOLOGIES
technologies.heading: State-of-the-Art Machinery
technologies.description: Our production facility equipped with the most advanced machines from world-renowned brands

products.title: OUR PRODUCTS
products.heading: Wide Product Range
products.description: High-quality gear solutions suitable for all types of industrial applications

whyUs.title: WHY US?
whyUs.heading: Reasons to Choose Precision Gear
whyUs.description: Our distinctive features and customer-focused approach in the industry

highQuality.title: High Quality Standards
highQuality.description: With our ISO 9001:2015 certified production processes and quality control systems compliant with DIN standards, we guarantee excellence in every product.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Thanks to our optimized production processes and large stock capacity, we deliver even your urgent orders on time.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our mechanical engineers and technicians with over 25 years of experience guide you even in the most complex projects.

competitivePrices.title: Competitive Prices
competitivePrices.description: We offer the most competitive prices in the industry without compromising on high quality. Special discounts are available for bulk orders.

afterSalesSupport.title: After-Sales Support
afterSalesSupport.description: We are with you even after product delivery. We provide continuous support with our technical support, maintenance, and repair services.

internationalExperience.title: International Experience
internationalExperience.description: With our export experience to Europe, Middle East, and Asia, we offer production and service quality at global standards.

stats.title: BY THE NUMBERS

stats.description: Results of years of experience and customer satisfaction-focused work
